newsitem.title: USA: Baystate net sales for fiscal year.
newsitem.headline: Baystate net sales for fiscal year.

text.p: Baystate Technologies Inc said Wednesday it reported record sales and earnings for the first fiscal year following its acquisition of the CADKEY(R) mechanical CAD (Computer-Aided Design) software product line.

For the fiscal year ending June 30, 1997, Baystate reported net sales of $6.1 million, which more than tripled the net sales of $2.0 million for the prior 12 month period. A company spokesman said no other earnings results were available.

Baystate Technologies, a privately-held company founded and incorporated in 1989, develops, manufactures and markets CADKEY and DRAFT-PAK professional 2D/3D PC-CAD software for mechanical engineering applications.
